Text.Page:
[Achieve Hyderad's Wisdom]

Learn to slow down and enjoy the beauty that nature provides to all. Come to pastoral {@Rgn:71001$$Bastion} and join the Hyderad Legacy. Speak to {@LinkCreature:71#3001#Arisel} of the Hyderad Legacy.

We can show you a different way to save the world.

We've been watching you, .

The world is broken. Most places, nature weeps.

But not here. Hyderad's followers plan to keep it that way. Want to make something beautiful?
